summary: In this context, 1,3-Benzothiazole (BT) and benzothiazole are related as they are both part of the benzothiazole chemical family. The study discusses the leachability of BT in environmental samples, while benzothiazole is mentioned in relation to its derivatives and overall contribution to street runoff. However, the specific relationship between 1,3-Benzothiazole and benzothiazole is not elaborated upon, indicating a general connection rather than a detailed interaction.
